data.lyric:
[ti:Sandra's Rose (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake]
[al:Scorpion (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Sandra's Rose (Explicit) - Drake
[00:00.03]Producer：DJ Premier/Maneesh
[00:00.06]Sample：
[00:00.10]Yeah no more no more
[00:02.91]Baby baby baby baby baby baby baby
[00:06.58]Yeah no more no more
[00:09.30]Baby baby baby baby baby baby baby ooh
[00:14.70]Drake：
[00:14.91]Yeah
[00:19.98]N**gas see the crib and ask who did I steal from
[00:23.14]Price tags on makin' the world feel some
[00:26.43]They don't have enough to satisfy a real one
[00:29.52]Maverick Carter couldn't even get the deal done
[00:32.70]n**gas scared to come towards us gotta run from us
[00:35.83]Louisville hush money for my young gunners
[00:39.03]Rick Pitino I take 'em to strip clubs and casinos
[00:42.12]Stack of c-notes get all you n**gas scratched like Preemo
[00:45.70]Worms I just opened up a can of those
[00:48.43]My mother had a flower shop but I was Sandra's Rose
[00:51.84]Two girls that I rope like Indiana Jones
[00:54.72]I make them hoes walk together like I'm Amber Rose
[00:58.05]Yeah f**k that I got to up the ante
[01:01.27]California girls sweeter than pieces of candy
[01:04.51]Had me all in Nipsey hood to go link up with Sammy
[01:07.50]Type of hood where bandanas make n**gas a family
[01:10.57]Head on a swivel I could shoot but I could never dribble
[01:13.58]Life too short I gotta get it 'fore they blow the whistle
[01:16.84]My uncle tryna change my energy with stones and crystals
[01:20.19]But it's gon' take more than that for me to control my issues
[01:23.40]I wasn't made for no casket or no prison cell
[01:26.54]Every title doin' numbers like I'm Miss Adele
[01:29.62]Sandra knows I pulled us out of a living hell
[01:33.04]I'm the chosen one flowers never pick themselves
[01:35.61]Sample：
[01:36.11]Yeah no more no more
[01:38.33]Baby baby baby baby baby baby baby
[01:42.02]Yeah no more no more
[01:44.64]Baby baby baby baby baby baby baby ooh
[01:54.72]Drake：
[01:55.73]N**gas want a classic that's just ten of these
[01:58.55]Crime family like the Genovese
[02:00.50]You don't want drama capisci
[02:01.94]My house is full of supermodels just like Mohamed Hadid
[02:05.18]I take this sh*t too serious you n**gas my comic relief
[02:08.31]I find it funny how I keep on talkin' and commas increase
[02:11.55]I'm standin' at the top of where you n**gas are climbin' to reach
[02:14.75]I even got my very own initials inscribed on my sheets
[02:17.98]Subtle reminders are key jeez
[02:21.13]Spoiler alert the second act is tragic
[02:23.83]And everyone that wants the worst for me's askin' what happened
[02:27.00]Backstabbed so many times I started walkin' backwards
[02:30.12]Like Charlamagne I see the light and see the darkest patches
[02:34.37]Bury me and I'll be born again
[02:36.91]I walk in godly form amongst the mortal men
[02:40.07]I got some real demons across the border fence
[02:43.06]And made a note of the mistakes we can't afford again
[02:46.23]Like I said can of worms and I'm the early bird
[02:49.02]n**gas want to hang but I'm too busy doin' dirty work
[02:52.63]Hit 'em back and say we'll link up on the 33rd
[02:55.65]When I say that they cursin' me it ain't dirty words
[02:58.77]Church of Pentecost Holy Spirit synagogue
[03:02.14]I don't know who's protectin' me but we hit it off
[03:05.17]Sandra's rose no wonder they tryna' pick me off
[03:08.40]I guess you gotta show these n**gas who you really are
[03:10.67]Sample：
[03:10.87]Yeah no more no more
[03:13.67]Baby baby baby baby baby baby baby
[03:17.31]Yeah no more no more
[03:20.09]Baby baby baby baby baby baby baby ooh
data.trans:
[ti:Sandra's Rose (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake]
[al:Scorpion (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.01]//
[00:00.02]//
[00:00.03]//
[00:00.10]再也不会了 再也不会了 
[00:02.91]宝贝 宝贝 宝贝
[00:06.58]再也不会了 再也不会了 
[00:09.30]宝贝 宝贝 宝贝
[00:14.70]//
[00:14.91]//
[00:19.98]伙计们看到我的房子 问我是从谁那里偷来的
[00:23.14]价格明码标注 让这个世界有些别样的感觉
[00:26.43]他们没有足够的钱来满足真正的需求
[00:29.52]甚至马弗里克·卡特也无法完成这个目标
[00:32.70]伙计们害怕见到我们 早早地就跑开了
[00:35.83]给我路易斯维尔的枪手一些封口费
[00:39.03]里克·皮蒂诺 我带他们去脱衣舞俱乐部和赌场
[00:42.12]一沓钱让你们这些伙计挨一顿打
[00:45.70]等着 后面还有更惨的呢
[00:48.43]我母亲有一家花店 但我是桑德拉的玫瑰
[00:51.84]我控制的两个女孩像印第安纳·琼斯
[00:54.72]我让她们两个人一起走 好像我就是艾波·罗丝
[00:58.05]我得加大赌注了
[01:01.27]加州女孩比糖果还甜美
[01:04.51]让我来到了Nipsey的街区 见到了Sammy
[01:07.50]在那里 伙计们可以随意地组成家庭
[01:10.57]晕头转向 我可以投篮 但我不会运球
[01:13.58]生命很短暂 我得在他们揭发我之前成功
[01:16.84]我的叔叔想要水晶和宝石改变我
[01:20.19]但我需要更多来控制自己的生活
[01:23.40]我不是为棺材 牢房而生
[01:26.54]各个新闻标题都在统计数据 好像我就是阿黛尔
[01:29.62]桑德拉知道我把我们从人间地狱救了出来
[01:33.04]我是天之骄子 花儿永远不会伤害自己
[01:35.61]//
[01:36.11]再也不会了 再也不会了 
[01:38.33]宝贝 宝贝 宝贝
[01:42.02]再也不会了 再也不会了 
[01:44.64]宝贝 宝贝 宝贝
[01:54.72]//
[01:55.73]伙计们想要一张经典之作 现在有10张了
[01:58.55]犯罪家族 比如热那亚人
[02:00.50]你不想要戏剧性的卡皮西
[02:01.94]我的房子里满是超模 就像Mohamed Hadid
[02:05.18]我太严肃了 你们忽略了我的喜剧效果
[02:08.31]我发现有趣的是 我一直在不停地说
[02:11.55]我就站在你们都试图爬上去的巅峰
[02:14.75]我甚至在我的床单上刻了我自己名字的首字母
[02:17.98]些许的提醒是关键 
[02:21.13]剧透警告 第二幕是悲剧
[02:23.83]每个人都想要看到我最坏的结果 都在问发生了什么
[02:27.00]多次背后中刀 我开始后退
[02:30.12]就像Charlamagne 我看到了光芒 看到了最黑暗的角落
[02:34.37]把我埋了 我就会再次重生
[02:36.91]我以虔诚的姿态走在凡人中间
[02:40.07]我带着一些真正的魔鬼越过边境
[02:43.06]并记录下那些我们再也无法承受的错误
[02:46.23]就像我说过的一样 对于那一罐虫子而言 我是早起的鸟儿 
[02:49.02]伙计们想要中止 但我正忙着一些别的事情
[02:52.63]给他们回个电话 说我们33号再联系
[02:55.65]当我说他们诅咒我的时候 那不是脏话
[02:58.77]五旬节教会 圣灵会堂
[03:02.14]我不知道谁在保护我 但我们很合得来
[03:05.17]桑德拉的玫瑰 难怪他们想要把我摘下
[03:08.40]我想你要告诉这些伙计 你的真实身份了
[03:10.67]//
[03:10.87]再也不会了 再也不会了 
[03:13.67]宝贝 宝贝 宝贝
[03:17.31]再也不会了 再也不会了 
[03:20.09]宝贝 宝贝 宝贝
